ygData.subject: Re: Obsidian Rings
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah... I looked up the stats on them and they don t seem to be all that impressive to me, to tell you the truth.  There are better rings out there for much
ygData.messageBody:
>They are dropped in Sol A off a named imp called
>kindle.

Ah... I looked up the stats on them and they don't seem to be
all that impressive to me, to tell you the truth. There are better
rings out there for much less hassle. You could get the gold
carnelian or the Platinum Black Pearl stuff from an enchanger (major
boosts to AGI and DEX) or simply go for the Jagged Band approach if
you've already reached the point of diminishing returns for AGI and
DEX and would like to just have some nice, raw AC. :)

--
Aaron Braunstein
Pacific Data Management, Inc.

<aaron_braunstein@...>
